radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis; normal heart size; mild left intrahepatic biliary dilation stable from prior CT; distended gallbladder with circumferential wall thickening, hyperemia, and substantial surrounding fat stranding compatible with acute cholecystitis; small amount of perihepatic fluid; pancreas normal; spleen normal with unchanged peripheral calcification; 1.6 cm right adrenal nodule stable; simple cysts in both kidneys; small hiatal hernia; extensive diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon; small volume free fluid in pelvis; no lymphadenopathy; no abdominal aortic aneurysm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The mild left intrahepatic biliary dilation is stable from prior CT; the 1.6 cm right adrenal nodule is stable since unspecified.
